RespTxt: Yes, Russia interfered to help Trump
QuestionTxt: Do you believe Russia tried to interfere in the 2016 US election, or not? Do you think Russia interfered in order to help elect Donald Trump, or do you think they interfered, but not to help elect Donald Trump?
StudyNote: The interviews were conducted by land-line and cell phones. Interviews were conducted by SSRS--Social Science Research Solutions.
